backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, payments, monetary events, travel entries, and app data storage with access control and profile save/fetch methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global CSS.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component handling authentication, profile setup, and rendering the ledger page within providers and an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Error boundary that displays a fallback UI with reload option and optional error details.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with branding, sync status, user dropdown, and logout functionality that clears identity, cache, and local storage.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication wrapper showing a login screen until identity is established, then rendering children.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty state component showing an icon or illustration, text, and an optional action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users for their name and saving the profile with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveTableS: Wrapper providing a scrollable horizontal area for tables with optional custom classes.
frontend/src/components/SyncStatusIndica: Displays sync status with icons and optional last-sync timestamp.
frontend/src/features/ledger/BackupResto: Handles exporting ledger data to a file and restoring backups with confirmation and merge logic.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CarExpenses: Manages car expense entry, auto-toll settings, and totals calculation within a date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CashPayment: Dialog form for recording a cash payment for a traveller with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ClearDataPa: Provides password-protected actions to clear various categories of ledger data with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CoTraveller: Dialog for adding income from co-travellers with date selection and validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DailyPartic: Renders a grid for marking AM/PM trips per traveller by date, including weekend toggles and save actions.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DateRangePi: Provides UI controls for selecting start and end dates using popover calendars.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCarEx: Confirmation dialog for deleting a car expense and triggering a toast notification.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCashP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a cash payment tied to a traveller with toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteTripH: Dialog confirming deletion of a trip or co-traveller income entry for a specific date.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCarExpe: Form dialog for editing a car expense's category, amount, date, and note with validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCashPay: Dialog for editing a traveller's cash payment amount, date, and optional note.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCoTrave: Dialog for updating co-traveller income details including amount, date, and note with basic validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditTripHis: Dialog to edit a traveller’s morning/evening participation for a specific date and save changes.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExpenseHist: Modal wrapper displaying the expense history view with scrollable content.
Shows car expenses with filtering, searching, sorting, and edit/delete controls.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportButto: Button that opens the export report dialog.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportRepor: Dialog to export ledger data with selectable formats, sections, and traveller filters.
Main ledger page managing tabs, dialogs, mobile navigation, and unsaved-change handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/LedgerState: Context provider exposing ledger state, data, and mutation functions from local state hooks.
frontend/src/features/ledger/MobileLedge: Mobile sidebar navigation listing ledger tabs and actions like history and export.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OtherPendin: Dialog form for adding an 'other pending' amount for a traveller, with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OverallSumm: Computes and displays total income, expenses, profit/loss, and monthly breakdowns for the selected date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentHist: Dialog wrapper that displays the payment history view with scrollable content.
Shows a filterable, sortable table of cash payments with edit/delete actions within the date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentSumm: Calculates per-traveller totals for charges, payments, pending amounts, and balances, plus overall totals.
frontend/src/features/ledger/RatePerTrip: Input control for viewing and updating the global rate charged per trip with validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/SummaryPane: Displays per-traveller trip counts, charges, payments, pending amounts, and balances for the selected range.
Renders action buttons allowing adding cash payments and other pending amounts for a traveller.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TravellerMa: UI component to add, edit, and remove travellers, blocking deletion when balances are unsettled.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TripHistory: Generates and displays trip and income history rows with edit/delete dialogs based on date range and ledger data.
frontend/src/features/ledger/UnsavedChan: A modal dialog prompting users to stay or discard unsaved changes on the participation page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppDataSync.ts: Handles periodic sync and merge of local ledger state with backend data, including conflict resolution and debounced saves.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoTollSettings.t: Manages auto-toll configuration in localStorage with helpers to enable, disable, and adjust the toll amount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login/logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLedgerLocalState.t: React hook managing ledger state with localStorage persistence, including travellers, trips, payments, expenses, and date ranges.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile through an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining light/dark palettes and improved table styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/backupRestore.ts: Utility for exporting, importing, validating, and merging ledger backup JSON files.
frontend/src/utils/dateRange.ts: Date utilities for formatting, generating ranges, and extracting weekdays.
frontend/src/utils/exportExcel.ts: Generates and downloads CSV exports of daily trip grids and summary calculations.
frontend/src/utils/exportPdf.ts: Builds printable HTML for PDF export with configurable ledger sections and traveller filters.
frontend/src/utils/exportReport.ts: Builds CSV export sections for daily grids, traveller summaries, payments, and expenses using ledger state and filters.
frontend/src/utils/ledgerBalances.ts: Computes a traveller’s balance by summing trip charges and pending amounts minus payments within a date range.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats amounts as INR currency and parses currency strings into numbers.
frontend/src/utils/paymentStatus.ts: Derives payment status and styling info based on positive, negative, or zero balance.
frontend/src/utils/tripCalculations.ts: Calculates total and monthly income from daily trip data and co-traveller income within a date range.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/src/utils/weekendInclusion.ts: Determines weekend inclusion rules for editing and calculations based on settings and saved trip data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending theming, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, required UI fixes, and feature restoration tasks including logout menu addition, multi-device sync, responsive date-range UI, desktop navigation visibility, and PDF/Excel export enablement.
